verbs.description: [ARG0: Stephen King] [V: jumped] [ARG2: on Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-PRP: to take a jab at the president] but was slammed for his ' hateful ' remark about Melania Trump 's hospitalization following kidney surgery .
